Color¶


class color_class.Color(*args: Any, **kwargs: Union[str, int, dict])[source]¶

Instantiate with escape codes, values or key-values and get or print processed arguments

Set class attributes for Color.print() or Color.get()

keys:

“color”, “effect”, “background”

effects:

None, “bold”, “underline”, “negative”

colors:

“black”, “red”, “green”, “yellow”, “blue”, “purple”, “cyan”

Parameters

  • args – Codes can be entered in any number of arguments The first three integers/strings will be used

  • kwargs – Three specific keys can be used color, effect, background for class kwargs, though subclasses can also be added

set(*args: Any, **kwargs: Union[str, int, dict])[source]¶

Call to change class values, or add new subclasses of separate colors, effects and backgrounds

Parameters

  • args – Integer escape codes or strings to be converted into escape codes

  • kwargs – Be more precise with keyword arguments
